survey_name: Adoption of AI in Small Business Accounting Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the current adoption rates, challenges, and satisfaction levels of small businesses using AI-powered accounting tools.

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your business's use of AI in accounting?
answer_options: We do not use AI in accounting
We are considering AI for accounting but have not adopted it yet
We use AI-powered accounting tools for specific tasks
AI is fully integrated into our accounting processes
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to categorize the respondent's level of AI adoption.
